solution_line_template: There are {tulips}+{daisies}=<<{tulips}+{daisies}={non_rose_flowers}>>{non_rose_flowers} flowers that are not roses.

Therefore, ({non_rose_flowers}/{total_flowers})*{percentage_multiplier}=<<({non_rose_flowers}/{total_flowers})*{percentage_multiplier}={percentage_not_roses}>>{percentage_not_roses}% of the flowers are not roses.
